#### Attributions {.appendix}
All artwork by [@allison_horst](https://twitter.com/allison_horst) except for the images related to the following articles:

- [Dec date](../dec/date/index.qmd), which shows an [Observable](https://observablehq.com) [calendar🗓️plot](https://observablehq.com/@observablehq/plot-calendar)
- [Dec time](../dec/time/index.qmd), which shows an [Observable](https://observablehq.com) [daylight☀️plot with globes🌍](https://observablehq.com/@dbridges/visualizing-seasonal-daylight)
- [Positron](../software/positron/index.qmd), which combines the [VSCode](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Visual_Studio_Code_1.35_icon.svg) and [VSCodium](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:VSCodium_Logo.png) logos
- [LLM](../ml/llm/index.qmd), which was generated by `DALL·E` `3` with the following prompt:

> a cartoon image of a person climbing a mountain to obtain answers to their questions from an omniscient robotic guru with a glowing positronic brain
